name: Marina Grand Hotel
description: Located right on Marina Beach, this luxurious 5-star hotel offers sea-view rooms, an infinity pool, and world-class hospitality.

name: Bay View Inn
description: Nestled along ECR with a beautiful bay view, Bay View Inn is perfect for a peaceful coastal retreat.

name: The Orchid Stay
description: Comfortable and budget-friendly, The Orchid Stay is ideal for business travelers and families alike.

name: Palm Tree Residency
description: Just minutes from the airport, Palm Tree Residency blends convenience with quality service.

name: Le Gardenia Hotel
description: Located in the bustling Anna Nagar, this hotel offers comfort and accessibility to major landmarks.

name: Sunset Pavilion
description: Offering breathtaking sunset views over the Bay of Bengal, this hotel is a favorite for romantic getaways.

name: Beach Bay Retreat
description: Escape to peace and sand at Beach Bay Retreat, offering coastal charm and modern amenities.

name: Elite Residency
description: In the heart of shopping hub T Nagar, Elite Residency is a smart choice for shopaholics and business visitors.

name: Urban Comfort Inn
description: Blending urban luxury with comfort, this hotel is great for business stays in South Chennai.

name: Crescent Suites
description: Located on OMR, Crescent Suites caters well to IT professionals and families with stylish rooms and rooftop dining.

name: Horizon Inn
description: Horizon Inn offers a cozy, premium stay in Central Chennai with easy access to transportation hubs.

name: Green Leaf Hotel
description: Green Leaf offers a green and quiet atmosphere, ideal for budget-conscious travelers and families.

name: Harbor Lights Residency
description: One of the top luxury stays in North Chennai, Harbor Lights features beachfront dining and elegant suites.

name: Tropical Pearl Hotel
description: Tropical Pearl offers an island-inspired stay with modern amenities in a suburban setting.

name: Ocean View Towers
description: A luxury beachfront tower with panoramic sea views, fine dining, and spa services—perfect for high-end travelers.
